name: Counter War Duty - Forces Com
description:
Counter War Duty - Forces Commando is equipped with the most fluent action, the most exquisite graphics, as a first person shooting (FPS) to bring a very exciting gaming experience.As a member of the war commando, you have been the most elite of our army. And you must be the choice to complete the special task of war. As a shooting game lovers must not miss this game can give you the real war scenes experience. You can learn through this game all kinds of fighting, war knowledge. You can see completely different from the usual life
Features
Intriguing gameplay
Eye catching, real 3d environments
Adventurous and thrill filled levels
Various deadly missions
HD quality Audio and Video
